data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Momtazi, Farzaneh, Sari, Alireza, Maghsoudlou, Abdolvahab (2014): New species and new record of hadzioids (Amphipoda: Senticaudata, Hadzioidea) from the Persian Gulf, Iran. Zootaxa 3881 (5): 440-452, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3881.5.2
